Biocals.help: Ask subject to run biocals (i.e., look left, look up, etc.)

LRLR.help: Ask subject to practice LRLR eye movements

TLR Training 1.help: Play the first step of TLR training

TLR Training 2.help: Play the second step of TLR training

Dream report.help: Ask for a dream report and start recording

Note.help: Open a textbox to take a time-stamped miscellaneous note
